stories.Title: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope captures fascinating Black Hole Phenomenon
stories.Description: An unprecedented trail of star formation is left behind by this speedy black hole, as the gas compressed along its wake condenses and forms stars.
stories.Tweet: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope captures fascinating Black Hole Phenomenon  📦 An unprecedented trail of star formation is left behind by this speedy black hole, as the gas compressed along its wake condenses and forms stars. # https://hubblesite.org/contents/news-releases/2023/news-2023-010

stories.Title: Meta's Buck2 is now publicly available
stories.Description: Engineers and developers are now able to boost their code production and cut build times in half thanks to this new open source large-scale build system.
stories.Tweet: Meta's Buck2 is now publicly available 📦 Engineers and developers are now able to boost their code production and cut build times in half thanks to this new open source large-scale build system. # https://engineering.fb.com/2023/04/06/open-source/buck2-open-source-large-scale-build-system/

stories.Title: Introducing Tabby: A Self-hosted AI coding assistant
stories.Description: This alternative to GitHub Copilot provides complete control over your data and can be integrated into your hardware.
stories.Tweet: Introducing Tabby: A Self-hosted AI coding assistant 📦 This alternative to GitHub Copilot provides complete control over your data and can be integrated into your hardware. # https://github.com/TabbyML/tabby

stories.Title: Live from Cape Canaveral! SpaceX launches its 23rd mission of 2023
stories.Description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket has lifted off again, this time carrying NASA's TEMPO instrument to orbit on an Intelsat 40e satellite.
stories.Tweet: Live from Cape Canaveral! SpaceX launches its 23rd mission of 2023 📦 SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket has lifted off again, this time carrying NASA's TEMPO instrument to orbit on an Intelsat 40e satellite. # https://www.nasaspaceflight.com/2023/04/inteslat-40e-tempo/

stories.Title: Samsung is lowering the production of memory chips
stories.Description: Samsung Electronics, a chip-making giant, has decided to cut its production due to a slow global economy and less demand after Covid.
stories.Tweet: Samsung is lowering the production of memory chips 📦 Samsung Electronics, a chip-making giant, has decided to cut its production due to a slow global economy and less demand after Covid. # https://www.bbc.com/news/business-65210190

stories.Title: Apple may be coming up with a new iPod
stories.Description: Apple's latest patent for an AirPod case is likely to evoke millennial nostalgia, as it bears a striking resemblance to one of their most iconic devices.
stories.Tweet: Apple may be coming up with a new iPod 📦 Apple's latest patent for an AirPod case is likely to evoke millennial nostalgia, as it bears a striking resemblance to one of their most iconic devices. # https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/06/apple-reinvents-ipod-airpods-case-patent/

stories.Title: Conversational AI is coming to Google’s search engine
stories.Description: In a recent interview, Google's CEO announced plans to incorporate conversational AI into its search engine in response to increasing competition from AI chatbots like ChatGPT.
stories.Tweet: Conversational AI is coming to Google’s search engine 📦 In a recent interview, Google's CEO announced plans to incorporate conversational AI into its search engine in response to increasing competition from AI chatbots like ChatGPT. # https://www.searchenginejournal.com/google-plans-to-integrate-conversational-ai-into-search-engine/484223/#close

stories.Title: Google Pay could be giving you free money
stories.Description: Several Google Pay users got a surprise recently when a bug in the app caused cash to be deposited accidentally into their accounts.
